.. index::
   single: Person
   single: NBIT_Taxon_9606
   single: material entity
   
Person
======

A person is an `NBIT_Taxon_9606 <http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/NCBITaxon?iri=http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/NCBITaxon_9606>`_ . In `BFO <http://www.ontobee.org/ontology/BFO>`_ persons are `material entities <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000040>`_.  VIVO provides the assertion NBIT_Taxon_9606 is a material entity.

Names
-----

People have names

Roles and Relationships
-----------------------

People have *roles* in processes.

People have *relationships* to other entities.
